content.rendered:
Directed by Sooraj R. Barjatya.

Written by Aash Karan Atal.

Cast Salman Khan(Prem Dilwale / Yuvraj Vijay Singh). Abhinay Raj Singh(Prem brother). Sonam Kapoor(Maithili). Neil Nitin Mukesh(Yuvraj Ajay Singh). Deepak Dobriyal(Kanhaiya). Arman Kohli(Chirag Singh). Swara Bhaskar(Chandrika). Aashika Bhatia(Radhika). Deepraj Rana(Sanjay). Manoj Joshi(Bhandari). Sanjay Mishra(Chaubey Ji). Samaira Rao(Sameera). Anupam Kher(Diwan). Suhasini Mulay(DadI (Grandmother of Rajkumari Maithili)). Sameer Dharmadhikari(Vijay’s Father). Prem Khan(Masuri Ji). Lata Sabharwal(Chandrika’s Mother). Karuna Pandey(Maharani). Namrata Thapa(NGO Lady). Brijendra Kala(Panwari). V.M. Badola(Chaudhary (as Vishwa Mohan Badola)). Mukesh S. Bhatt(Chuttan (as Mukesh Bhatt)). Gurpal Singh(Sardar). Sucheta Khanna(Sardarni). Bikramjeet Kanwarpal(Journalist). Aaradhna Uppal(Journalist (as Aaradhana Uppal)). S.M. Zaheer(Doctor 1). Micky Makhija(Doctor 2). Alok Pandey(Montu). Abhijit Bhor(Raavan (as Abhijeet Bhor)). 

Languages Hindi. Tamil. English. French.

Producers Ajit Kumar Barjatya. Devaansh S. Barjatya. Kamal Kumar Barjatya. Kavita Barjatya. Rajat A. Barjatya. Rajkumar Barjatya. Ruchi Ajit Barjatya. Shalendra Suwalka.

Production Rajshri Productions.
